mapper.select: SELECT dept_no, name dept_name FROM dept order by dept_no desc

SELECT teacher.teacher_no,`user`.`name` teacher_name FROM dept,teacher,user where dept.dept_no = teacher.dept_no AND `user`.user_no = teacher.teacher_no AND dept.dept_no = #{deptNo} order by teacher_no desc
SELECT major.major_no,major.`name` major_name FROM major ORDER BY major_no desc
SELECT class.class_no,class.class_index,major.`name` major_name from class,major WHERE class.major_no=major.major_no AND class.grade = #{grade} AND major.major_no = #{majorNo}
SELECT course.course_no,course.course_name FROM course ORDER BY course_no desc
